pullrequest.title: Fix broken links in Add Sensor (follow up to PR #264)

content.raw:
I get confused by the rendering of links that include backticks:

~~~
[I think this is a link when it gets rendered](link)

[`but I don't think that this looks like a link when it gets rendered`](link)
~~~

just my opinion, not sure if other people feel the same way.

Will these two links still render correctly without the backticks?
content.html:
I get confused by the rendering of links that include backticks:

[I think this is a link when it gets rendered](link)

[`but I don't think that this looks like a link when it gets rendered`](link)

just my opinion, not sure if other people feel the same way.

Will these two links still render correctly without the backticks?
